additionalnotes.value: Metastatic Breast Cancer. Recommend 50% dose reduction in patients with Bilirubin levels greater than 50 umol/L. MAXIMUM cumulative dose: 140 mg/m2 for patients with no prior RT or anthracyclines or normal cardiac function; 120 mg/m2 in patients with previous anthracycline, RT or cyclophosphamide use; 100 mg/m2 in patients with previous maximum dose anthracyclines, if cardiac assessment is acceptable.
